name: London's Biggest Postgraduate Event - QS World Grad School Tour
content: Does travelling the world while studying a postgraduate degree sound like the perfect next step for you? If the answer is yes, then we have just what your looking for! QS returns to London on 3rd March with it's world renowned International Masters Fair - QS World Grad School Tour. This is your chance to meet with admissions directors from 50+ of the world's top ranked universities and find your ideal Masters program. This years exhibitors include Bocconi, Cass, Durham, EDHEC, G.Washington, IE, Imperial, King's, LBS, LSE, NYU, SMU, UCL, St.Gallen and many more... On the day you will also get the chance to attend informative seminars on the application process and studying abroad and gain access to a pool of scholarships worth up to $7 million. You will also be able to apply for application fee waivers from select universities and the first 100 attendees will recieve a copy of the QS TopGrad School Guide. EXCLUSIVE GIVEAWAY: Sign up for free and attend the event to be in with a chance of winning return flights to visit a university of your choice within Europe! If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us at uk@qs.com. We look forward to seieng you there! Team QS Price: FREE Time: 12:30 pm - 6:00 pm
